attributes.title: disgusting
attributes.review: WORST APP. when i opened the app there was some kindof glitch where some type of cockroach showed up on the screen. i got so scared that i threw my phone and it shattered! i’m writing this on my new phone!!!! (ICE is r*ping kids and s*x tr*fficking them,,, there are over 3000 kids “missing”. breonna taylor and elijah mcclains murderers are STILL free. poc have to fight for their rights everyday. people in yemen are dying, eating LEAVES, in the verge of extinction, please donate and sign petitions. cornelius fredericks, 16, was killed for throwing a sandwich.) GET THIS APP OFF THE APP STORE! 😹😹

attributes.title: do not download!!!!!
attributes.review: downloaded this app to try and see what the wonderful 45 was saying. as soon as i opened the app it crashed and deleted everything from my phone EXCEPT for this app. i tried for the next few days to get everything back and delete the app that caused this (the trump 2020 app to be clear). i checked my camera roll to see that my icloud had multiple hour long videos on it of me going about daily life. THIS APP HACKED ALL OF MY INFORMATION AND WAS SPYING ON ME

attributes.title: May god help us all
attributes.review: So I decided to download this app the trump official app and I regret everything making this decision to put it on my device we have other news apps but this is only about trump and the notifications are crazy I’m so annoyed about this so this is not deserve to be in the App Store this app does not deserve to be here so I think it should be removed because we have other news apps that are not going crazy so may God help us all🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤢

I found out that the app was actually not a donald trump app but was really the zodiac killer app. The app was trying to set you up for you to be the zodiac killer. Also the app took 4 months to download and 2 hours to enter!!! And it crashed 7 times and was their was texting talking about ketchup! I was confused then it tried to say that it ordered taco bell??? what does that even mean. Finally i’m pretty sure the app records you and takes pictures of your fridge!!! 1 STAR😡😡😡(●´ω｀●)

attributes.title: Worst thing I have ever seen
attributes.review: When I opened the app it said “KeEp AmErIca GrEaT” honestly nothing about America is great ❤️LUV❤️. This app gave my dog lung cancer and he died within 2 minutes so if you love dogs and you wanna keep pets great I would recommend to download this and to the worst review and SAVE TikTok we don’t go down without a fight👸Now all these boomers are gonna come after me,🥱 BOOMERS🥱 don’t come for me unless you have information to back it up 😤 now I need to attend my dogs funeral, 🥺EXUSE ME🥺 XOXO 💋 not a fan

attributes.title: I almost died from this app!😡🤬
attributes.review: -69/10 absolutely would not recommend. It took forever to download and then once it did. I opened the app to learn more about our 🍊 in office. As soon as it opened I was transported into the land of oompaloompas and they started chanting for me to go back to where I came from and return their leader to his rightful place! It was very terrifying! I feel violated and we should return him to his homeland at once before they figure out how to cross over!

attributes.title: POC LIVES MATTER
attributes.review: Wether its black lives or hispanic lives he still finds ways to make their lives miserable. They plan on putting gas chambers at the border security and labeling them as concentration camps. Child trafficking is happening while everyone turns a blind eye. Black people are fighting against systemic racism which led to many innocent lives being killed. He is not fit to lead this country and we deserve better. #settleforbiden2020 at least he cares for the middle class and the lower class.

attributes.title: Terrible app
attributes.review: I came onto this app to find more information about our wilting orange peel looking wack president but I actually couldn’t find any information. Even if you do support him I wouldn’t recommend using this app. It glitches out and makes your phone bug out, not to mention all the terrible quality of the app in itself. I couldn’t find any information on him other than to vote for him. If I could give this app Zero stars I would.
